TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
Your Majesty, we managed to slay the leader of the creatures who have been invading Agaria.
Your Majesty, we managed to slay the leader of the creatures who have been invading Agaria.

Slain him? You make it sound so easy...
Slain him? You make it sound so easy...
Slain him? You make it sound so easy...
Slain him? You make it sound so easy...
It was far from easy, your Majesty. But he's gone, dead at the gates of Dhun-Kor. I think I've bought us some breathing room.

What do you mean?
What do you mean?
What do you mean?
What do you mean?
Khalkus believes that this Ogre, Dugog, was merely a lieutenant for some higher power, and that sooner or later the Ogre will be replaced.

In that case, you must travel back to Dhun-Kor and search for clues about where this Dugog came from, and who he worked for.

Yes, your Majesty. We'll leave tonight.
